spec_data.Name: rubygem-rubypants
spec_data.Description:
RubyPants is a Ruby port of the smart-quotes library SmartyPants.  The
original "SmartyPants" is a free web publishing plug-in for Movable Type,
Blosxom, and BBEdit that easily translates plain ASCII punctuation characters
into "smart" typographic punctuation HTML entities.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:28:05 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Ruby port of the smart-quotes library SmartyPants
